allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add self-reinforcement learning system for agents

Implement file-based lessons learned system enabling agents to:
- Read accumulated lessons before starting tasks
- Reflect and record insights after completing tasks
- Score lessons based on successful application
- Cross-reference lessons from related agents

New files:
- .claude/lessons/_template.md - Template for new lesson files
- .claude/lessons/_maintenance.md - Maintenance guide \(pruning, scoring, search\)
- .claude/lessons/_agent-learning-section.md - Reference section
- .claude/lessons/shared.lessons.md - 15 cross-cutting lessons
- .claude/lessons/developer.lessons.md - Sample lesson file

Updated all 34 agents with Self-Reinforcement Learning sections including:
- Pre-task lesson loading instructions
- Post-task reflection and recording process
- Cross-agent lesson references
- Tag-based lesson categorization

Features:
- Scoring system \(0-4 active, 5-9 proven, 10+ foundational\)
- Automatic pruning \(max 50 lessons per file\)
- Tag-based search via grep
- Quarterly maintenance procedures
- Statistics tracking per agent

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
